author: funnygiulio
content: hello, what is the magnitude of reorgs when forkchoice happen?

author: funnygiulio
content: just one block(the head) or can be multiples?

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: Reorgs can be deeper than one block if that's the question.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: They can be up to the last finalized block. Geth even wants to support reorgs 90k blocks beyond the finalized block, so that we can recover if something goes majorly wrong

author: m.kalinin
content: Re-org rewinding finalized block should rather be done manually. Ability to re-org 90k blocks is valuable for the case of non finality, the longest non finality period is expected to be about 2 weeks which is ~90k worth of blocks
